cnd5:5.2: paññapesi → paññapehi (sya-all); paññāpesi (mr) | uttānīkarosi → uttānīkarohi (sya-all); uttāniṁ karosi (mr)
cnd5:11.13: araññavanapatthāni → araññe vanapatthāni (bj) | manussarāhasseyyakāni → manussarāhaseyyakāni (bj, sya-all)
cnd5:12.8: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vā cittassa → pañcasuvā kāmagunesuvā cittassa (bj); pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittassa (cck); pañcasu vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa (sya1ed, sya2ed) | vosaggo → vossaggo (bahūsu) | anaṭṭhitakiriyatā → anaṭṭhitatā (sya-all); aniṭṭhitakiriyatā (mr)
cnd5:13.2: nandī → nandi (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | paligedho → paḷigedho (bj) | suttaṁ visaṭā → sottaṁ visatā (sya-all); sattā visatā (pts-vp-pli1) | santhavo → sandhavo (mr) | āsīsanā → āsiṁsanā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | sādhukamyatā → sādukamyatā (bj); asādhukammatā (pts-vp-pli1)
cnd5:14.2: gabbhaṭṭhitimūlakaṁ → gabbheṭhitimūlakaṁ (sya-all, mr) | ḍāho → ḍaho (bj, sya-all) | rakhasā → rakkhasā (mr) | lohitapittaṁ → lohitaṁ pittaṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
cnd5:24.1: vibhajitāni → vibhattāni (mr) | seyyathidaṁ → seyyathīdaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
cnd5:36.3: yācasi → āyācasi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); ayācasi (cck) | ajjhesasi → ajjhesi (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
cnd5:43.1: Tesaṁ cāyaṁ → tesa'yaṁ (bj); tesaṁ yāyaṁ (mr) | pacchimako → pacchimakoṭi (bj)
cnd5:45.3: Khuddako → khuddakopi (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | mahanto → mahantopi (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
cnd5:52.1: ramaṇīyaṭṭhena → idaṁ padaṁ bj, sya-all potthakesu natthi; mnd1:2 [Kāmasuttaniddesa]
cnd5:55.3: palibundheyya → paḷibuddheyya (bj); palibujjheyya (sya-all) | anajjhosanno → anajjhāpanno (bj, csp1ed); anajjhopanno (sya-all)
cnd5:56.30: byantīkareyya → byantiṁ kareyya (mr) | ārato → ārato assa (bj, mr)
cnd5:62.2: satiparibandhānaṁ → satipaṭipakkhānaṁ (bj, sya-all) | asammuṭṭhattā → appamuṭṭhattā (bj, sya-all)
